mapper.insert: insert into comm_bizfile (fileclassid, filename, filepath, filesize, filetype, fileuuid, entityname, entityid, filter, channelcode, createtime, creator, delflag)values (#{fileclassid}, #{filename}, #{filepath}, #{filesize}, #{filetype}, #{fileuuid}, #{entityname}, #{entityid}, #{filter}, #{channelcode}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{delflag})
mapper.select:
select * from comm_bizfile where delflag='0' and entityname = '${entityname}' and entityid='${entityid}'
and filter='${filter}'
mapper.update: update comm_bizfile set delflag='1' where id = #{fileid}
